attributes.content: Bloodied. Torn. Pierced.
Us. Enemies. People.
Wailing, screaming, groaning.

attributes.options: This isn’t right!;......!;I can’t take this anymore.

attributes.content: You have a question. Ask.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor... is this your first time seeing Rosmontis fight?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I know it’s hard to watch, but—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I’ll handle it. You go tend to the wounded enemies who can’t fight anymore. Also, among them are communications personnel relaying orders and intelligence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If they’re allowed to escape, it puts our whole operation at risk.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Roger.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Fourteen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: People, please... let me through!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What happened here? I just finished handling the...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor, did you just call me?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Who sent you out to fight?

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: This is too cruel!;...This is terrible...;You should not have to suffer through this.
...Why would they let you do this?

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: What are you talking about?;......;You did what...?

attributes.content: I did. I chose to fight. I want to fight.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: There are some feelings I can only experience on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Protecting my friends and family is the only way I can feel complete.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Rhodes Island needs me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The world is calling my name, to prevent more people like me from coming into it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Does death care that I am a child?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Would war or disease spare someone because they are a child?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: When Amiya or I stand on the battlefield... who looks at us and thinks 'children?'
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We’re 'monsters,' aren’t we, Doctor?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: No!;......;That’s just how you see yourself.

attributes.content: No, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It doesn’t matter what I am.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I just want to make a difference, with my family.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Do you know Scout?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Do you know Ace?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ..It’s already been a few days since I watched any of their materials.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I’ve forgotten a lot.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But I only forgot. I’m not like you, Doctor, who threw away everything.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, I didn’t mean that. But you get it, Amiya.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...I get it. But just... don’t say it like that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mm... Fine.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I’ve lost bits and pieces of things. Lots of pictures and words.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Those feelings... feelings I can’t say, only Amiya can understand...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But they never truly left me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor... I feel like you’re complicated.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Even more complicated than they say.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: They say I’m complicated too. Some of them are scared of me. Some of them say I shouldn’t be like this.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But they don’t know why I’m like this. They don’t know what I’ve been through.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Why does my heart suddenly ache? Why do I want to cry, now of all times?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Even though I can’t remember anything... why are my eyes still sore? Why are my lips dry?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Who left a stain in the corridor, and why hasn’t it been cleaned? Why do I feel worried when I break a vase, but also strangely happy?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Why do I feel disgust from looking at flowers, but wonder from looking at bugs?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What happened during all that time I can no longer remember? Why do these emotions keep welling up within me?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Every operator I feel has their own unique differences.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: And when I lose them, those feelings also disappear.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But why...? Why do we even have emotions?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Why do my tears keep flowing even when I can’t even feel anymore?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Didn’t I already forget everything?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But Rosmontis never wanted me to take her feelings away.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: These sudden surges of emotion belong to her, no matter what they are.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...They belong only to Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can’t interfere with them. As long as Rosmontis still has hope somewhere inside her... I won’t do that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because it’s up to her to choose what to do. She can also choose to forget.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To truly forget.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: What happened to Rosmontis?;......;I don’t know that much about her.

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}... Rhodes Island has a strict screening process for our operators.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Many of them apply for combat roles, and we reject most of those. We look at lots of different metrics to decide if an operator is fit for combat.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Combat ability, tactical aptitude, discipline, and physical fitness are all important parameters, but that barely scratches the surface.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: People often have difficulty trusting one another when they’re on an actual mission.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis is here because she trusts in our orders and objectives, and we trust in her abilities and judgment.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Please believe in me, Doctor. No, believe in us...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You’ll slowly begin to see... the colors of her emotions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor. Thank you for fighting alongside Blaze.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Why?;......;You don’t have to thank me.

attributes.content: Blaze needs more people fighting alongside her. And I want to see her smile.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to see you too. I want to see the one Ace and Scout always talked about.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Here you are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...She uses heavy machinery to quickly and effectively destroy the enemy, while at the same time exhibiting astonishing self-control and adaptiveness.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis is one of Rhodes Island’s greatest annihilation specialists.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As such, the way she treats people and the way she speaks may worry you. The way she fights and its contrast with her appearance, is indeed very cruel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Blaze running around with her chainsaw may be easier to accept, but the destruction of when Rosmontis takes the field is much harder to stomach.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If it will help you sleep at night, I can make you a promise. If it will help at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Rosmontis almost never kills. Though her tactics seems to singularly aim for that outcome, she actually focuses on disabling the enemy’s combat abilities.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Take the last battle, for example, all the enemies were disarmed, and not a single one died to Rosmontis’s attacks.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She also has much more control over her weapons than she once did.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course, whether or not we can keep the prisoners alive depends entirely on our ability to destroy Reunion’s leadership. Only then will we be able to send rescue teams into the core city.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But sometimes, we must use lethal force in order to accomplish our goals. Some loss of life is inevitable.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You still look disturbed. Is this all beyond your ability to accept?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I can’t accept this.;......;It doesn’t make sense.

attributes.content: You might not be able to accept the truth either.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Her terrifying Originium Arts and incredible perception are not the only reasons why Rosmontis is an elite operator.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Rosmontis demonstrates these qualities because she became an elite operator.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We made our judgment not on whether to send her to battle, but how disastrous the consequences might be if we didn’t let her become a fighter like this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Worst case scenario, her Arts leak out from her body and push her to kill, subconsciously or otherwise.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Humans killing each other has become the normal state of things. Even so, most people still hold their weapons and staves themselves.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Whether or not someone who has lost her sense of self can still be called a person is another topic I’m not interested in discussing. But humanity grapples with the extent and manifestation of this problem.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'When you deprive a human being of her sentience, what is left? What is created?'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'When that creation deprives us of our lives, who is at fault?'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The one who created the weapon, the one who used the weapon, or the one we treat as a weapon?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Another riddle?;......;I’ll figure it out myself.

attributes.content: As we move on to the next battle, I may be able to teach you more.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: By the way, on the issue of her age...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya puts on an air of maturity that may have you fooled. Maybe, maybe not.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A young creature known as a deadly weapon won’t be seen as an ordinary child just because she looks young.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Not to mention all that they’ve been through.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Take what you need. It’s time to head to the surface.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: What about Amiya? Is she a weapon too?

attributes.content: You can ask her yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is something you should hear from her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit! Stop right there!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Warfarin, I was just leaving. Whatever it is, make it quick.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You know the prophecy, don’t you? Yes, there’s nothing you don’t know.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Prophecy?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Is that not why you allowed Amiya to go?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Amiya is the commander of this operation, as well as the one who suggested it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But as young as Amiya is, how can she command—
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Warfarin, how long has it been since we left Kazdel?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be precise, or I’m leaving.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Two months?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Warfarin... stop joking around.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know what you mean. She’s grown up.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yes, Warfarin. Time flies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Age progression in Cautuses and Vampires is radically different. It has been three years since we left Kazdel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It may feel like a short time for you, but Amiya has matured a lot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Answer my first question. The prophecy.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: ...'The last Wendigo will die at the hands of the Lord of Fiends?'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Correct. I’m familiar with that guerilla group, and their leader. I’m certain it’s him.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The original phrasing of the prophecy was 'The son of Hor-Tekrz, traitor to Sarkaz and disreputable end of the bloodline, will be executed by the Lord of Sarkaz.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Some prophecy. Whether or not there’s any extension of their 'bloodline,' there are still many Wendigos living their lives in Columbia and Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...That is, if a few dozen can be called 'many.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And, considering the context of the time, you should view it as a threat. Many people did not want to see the Wendigos leave Kazdel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It wasn’t either of us who said it. And since you still remember it, you must have found it important. No?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Are you getting old? Since when do you believe in 'prophecies' and Sarkaz witchcraft?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Old? M-Me?!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I contracted Oripathy. Death is always here with me, waiting for the right time to strike. Warfarin, my life is no doubt much shorter than you think.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Must we be so morbid? I’m not your little girl Closure. I won’t let you keep skirting the topic.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The issue you raised is quite morbid.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Never mind.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hear me, Kal'tsit, the others may not say as much to you, but I will.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: He is one of the very few left among us. I am no bleeding heart, no goodly busybody, but... we are Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I am a Vampire, and the old man is a Wendigo, but we are the same.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This world is a tough place for Sarkaz. I hope he can return to Kazdel, if possible. Or come with us.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I’m not, Warfarin. I’m not Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So you refuse?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I’ll do what I can.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Even I remember him, Warfarin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your promise is stronger than anything.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Don’t get your hopes up that this will be easy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But this time, you’ll be there. As long as Dr. Kal'tsit makes her best effort, I’ll accept the outcome.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Maybe you haven’t heard, but your proposal came too late. Some things have already unfolded, and rather unfortunately.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Some time ago, an Infected clinic in Chernobog called 'Azazel' traded information with us. I learned some more information about the Wendigo in Reunion's service.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What’s more, and you should know this well, anyone who stands against the most brutal blade in Ursus will soon learn whether it tastes of salt or rust.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Nobody should knowingly place our operators in danger.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Some patients’ days are numbered, but that number depends on the doctor treating them. It’s all up to us.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: ...It’s all up to us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And I told you before... You may have forgotten.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I won’t discipline you for it, but I may do something to put an end to it once and for all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are not to say I’m frightening, Warfarin. We’ve been over this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Do not, under any circumstances, even at Rhodes Island, speak of ‘the Lord of Fiends.’'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ever.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All hands, at ease!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis... am I getting this right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm. Yes. I felt it too.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, something unexpected here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I’m not totally sure, but...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The core city might be... slowing down?
attributes.name: Amiya
